phrases: I am back here again...
Sister, Sister...
It appears our guest is still half-asleep.
Rem, Rem...
For one so young, it is quite sad how out of it he is.
What is the matter, sir?
Do you feel unwell?
What is wrong, sir?
Do you have a chronic illness flaring up?
Let me see your hands.
So it is true...
I was not mistaken...
No, sir.
I think you are mistaken about everything.
No, sir.
I think your very birth was a mistake.
When I think about what is to come, I cannot laugh off that comment.
But right now, even that is a good feeling.
Sister, Sister...
Could our guest be a troubled man, deriving pleasure from torture?
Rem, Rem, our guest appears to be
a pervert who is turned on by insults.
Sorry to do that out of the blue,
but I trust you both.
Let us be friends, okay?
It was awfully noisy, so I came to check.
Subaru, I am glad you seem well.
A second ago, I had a lot on my mind,
but seeing you blew it all away, Emilia-tan!
I guess you were the wonder drug that my heart needed.
Sorry, I have no idea what you are saying.
But good morning.
I am glad you are well.
Yeah, good morning.
Okay, might as well get started...
Hire me to work in this mansion!
I must clear two broad conditions,
in order to survive a week in Roswaal's mansion.
First is to earn the trust of the staff here.
If I do not gain those girls' favor,
they are liable to kill me, to silence me.
That goes not only for Rem and Ram,
but for their master, Roswaal, as well.
And second is to defeat the shaman that attacks Roswaal's mansion!
I am exhausted...
You are quite the hard worker.
I am not done yet.
I need to prepare dinner and clean the rooms.
I will get back to work after a little break.
It is only your first day, and you are so spirited.
Well...
Some important things are at stake here.
By the way, what kind of magic does Emilia-tan use?
Technically, Lia is not really a magic-user.
That goes for her contract with me, too.
She uses spirit arts.
So those who use magic and spirit arts are different...
Magic-users cast magic with their own mana,
but those who use spirit arts draw from mana in the atmosphere.
And how are those two different, Sensei?
Basically, it depends on whether you use a gate.
A gate?
Mana passes through a gate within your body.
Through the gate, you both draw mana in and expel it out.
I see, so it is like a spigot for MP...
You should also have one, Subaru.
R-Really?
Does that mean I can use magic, too?
Want me to figure out your attribute?
Magic-users are divided into fire, water, wind, and earth attributes...
Whoa, it is totally a magic sound effect!
I know what your attribute is.
Yes!
I have been waiting for this!
Is it the burning fire of passion?
Or a relaxed, cool-guy water type?
Or maybe a gentle wind, blowing across the plain?
Or is it solid, reliable earth?
Shadow
Shadow.
All rejected?!
Wow, shadow?
That is very rare.
What is shadow, anyway?
Were not there only four attributes?
This is a category error!
In addition to the four basic attributes,
there is also shadow and light.
Is it actually some amazing ability?
Like a talent only seen once in five thousand years?
With shadow magic,
you can obstruct an opponent's vision, block sound,
slow movements, and things like that.
It is just debuffs?
An easy one would be something like Shamac.
That is a blinding spell, right?
Want me to show you?
Wait, Puck...
For real?
Let us see, let us see!
Shamac!
Okay, that is it.
What did you think?
That was Shamac.
Are you all right?
I-I am fine!
It is not too flashy, but it seems pretty effective!
So I can also use this Shamac, right?
Well, that depends on your training.
Want to try the beginner's course?
Please, Master!
I will act as a support, and use the mana inside you,
so the magic will come from your own gate.
Lia, on the off-chance that Subaru's magic goes out of control and explodes,
you should step away, so your clothes do not get messy.
That only happens if I screw up really bad, right?!
If you can make relaxed, lighthearted comments like that, you will be fine.
Now, visualize the flow of mana through your body.
Then expel a part of it, through your gate, out of your body.
Visualizing, I can do.
Fantasizing is what I do best.
Huh?
That is not good.
The gate just
Long story short,
your control over your gate is not very good,
so you should not try too hard.
You are the one who said I would be fine.
Tee-hee!
That is not cute at all...
Well, for better or worse, your gate has not been well-used.
That is why the mana inside ignored the user's will, bursting out.
What am I, a soy sauce bottle with a loose cap?
You should not move.
You used up all the mana in your body.
Maybe you should not work anymore today
No!
I have to!
Do not try to overdo it!
This is exactly when I need to overdo it...
I cannot waste a single day.
You really are hopeless...
What
Chew.
Chew and swallow it.
Three...
And go!
Wh-What was that?
It is a bocco fruit.
When you eat it, your mana activates,
and your gate regains a little of its strength.
Sorry, I guess I have caused you some trouble.
You do not understand, Subaru...
It is more satisfying to hear a single thank you than a lot of sorrys.
I did it because I wanted to help,
not because I wanted an apology.
Okay?
So, Ram, given what you have seen so far,
what do you think of him?
In terms of abilities, he is completely incompetent,
but when it counts, he can be excessively quick-witted.
I believe it may be necessary to keep an eye on him for a time.
This is a problem we must handle with utmost care.
Be sure to give the proper warnings,
so your sister does not act rashly...
I guess that is about all I can expect of the first day.
I earned quite a bit of trust from Ram and Rem, I think.
But the problem is that shaman's attack...
How do I fight that?
You want to know more about shamans?
Yeah, how do you avoid curses?
There is not a way.
Huh?
Once a curse is activated, there is not any way to undo it, I suppose.
Once it is activated, that is it.
That is what curses are.
It is actually possible to nullify instant death resistances?
However, before they are activated, curses are just simple spells,
so I can easily undo them.
The scent of the witch...
You know, Rem mentioned that, too.
Who is this witch?
Are witches related to shamans?
In this world, the word witch only refers to one person.
The Jealous Witch?
Exactly.
The Jealous Witch, Satella.
Long ago, she devoured the six witches who bore the names of the deadly sins,
and drained half the world dry.
She is the worst of the worst, I suppose.
It is said that she was starved for love.
It is said that she does not understand human language.
It is said that her body never withers, weakens, or dies.
It is said that, though she was sealed by the powers of a dragon, a hero, and a sage,
they were unable to destroy her flesh.
It is said that her body is that of a half-elf with silver hair.
I am...
Satella.
What would it take to make someone steal the Jealous Witch's name?
Oh, I guess steal makes the person sound bad...
I should say to make someone borrow the Jealous Witch's name.
Either way, they must have no fear of death, I suppose.
One who would steal her name can be called nothing but insane.
I see...
So that is why.
Huh?
If people just saw her as a crazy freak,
she would not have to be involved in this royal selection mess...
What are you talking about, I suppose?
Nothing.
Good morning!
It is another sunny day, perfect for drying laundry!
Let us make this a happiness-filled day!
Now...
Victory!
Victory!
You are so energetic again this morning.
Yep!
Even as I am ordered around and disciplined by the maid sisters,
I will enjoy my servant's life to the fullest again!
But when that lifestyle wears me out,
I will come rest my head in your lap,
so save it for me, okay?
When you wash your face like that, you really do look like a cat!
So, do spirits get sleepy and stuff, too?
Do they oversleep?
Do not you people get sleepy when you are fatigued, too?
When a spirits' mana, the source of their energy, is depleted,
they experience something similar...
Did you two stay up all night or what?
I bet you were up late talking about who you like, right?
Let me in on the fun!
Eh?
Who I like?
It is embarrassing to say, but
The one I like is Puck, and the one Puck likes is me.
There.
That conversation's over.
Your love is mutual?!
Then where do I fit in?
Nowhere.
Lia's head-over-heels for my charms.
You are not a bad guy,
but compared to me, you have got nothing...
You should give up on Lia and
Do not get carried away, you two.
If you keep this up, I will get mad!
Ow!
Ow!
You are mad!
You are mad!
Whoops!
I should get going, or the maid sisters will be angry.
Bye.
What is wrong?
You do not look happy.
I just feel... sort of uneasy.
I cannot really explain it...
Well, I cannot blame you for being confused.
This has gotten to be a bit of a problem.
Do not worry!
Do not worry!
Forget about it!
It is fine!
A problem?
Relax!
I will clean this up so fast, no one will get hurt!
Subaru's mind is really mixed up.
The inside and outside are all confused.
I think that is an admirable attitude,
but you were the one who knocked it over.
I shall fetch a replacement
No, that is okay!
I will take care of the vase and flowers!
You just do your own work, Senpai!
If he keeps this up, he will wear himself out before long.
It feels great to finish a job, huh, Rem-rin?
But it was work you created and took care of on your own.
When did you learn where the vases are kept?
Did my sister...
Yeah, that is right!
Your sister told me!
Since she knows me, she said, You are bound to break a vase eventually.
I will tell you where the extra vases are, so you will be prepared.
Subaru-kun...
Whoops!
I forgot about some work Ram-chi asked me to do!
Would you excuse me for a bit?
I will take care of it quick.
Later!
I will come find you soon!
I feel sick...
Do not you think my knife technique has come a long way in only a day?
I think my talent has awakened!
I feel sick.
I feel sick.
I feel sick!
Rem-rin, check out my aptitude, which enables such detailed crafting!
A miracle must be residing in my fingertips right now!
Illusion!
I feel sick...
I feel sick...
I feel sick...
I feel sick...
I feel sick...
I feel sick...
Honestly, Emilia-tan!
Every time we meet, you stir my heart!
You are such a sinful girl!
You are guilty!
I should be better able to laugh.
I should be better able to make them laugh.
I cannot fail this time...
I cannot waste a single second.
I must throw all my strength into my work and produce results, or...
Oh, Ram-chi!
I was not slacking!
I will finish all my work!
You can just kick back in your room and take a siesta while I
Damn, I look so lame...
I do not have time to spend whining.
You idiot.
Subaru...
Emilia-tan!
Subaru, come with me.
Uh-oh!
A personal request from Emilia-tan?
How joyous!
How embarrassing!
How rare!
Say anything!
Tell me to do anything!
For you, I would dive into fire, water, the loot house, anywhere!
Subaru...
Hey, come on!
The Emilia-tan I know would say...
Wait!
Are you a fake?
But could anyone else look so gorgeous that I just want to hug her?
All right.
Subaru, come here.
Wha
Just come.
Okay, sit here.
Cannot I sit on the bed or a chair?
Why the floor?
Just sit!
Yes, madam!
With pleasure!
Just this once, all right?
Your position is a little weird.
And...
It tickles.
You are letting me rest in your lap?
Do not say it aloud!
It is embarrassing!
And no looking up here...
Close your eyes.
You are adorable when you are embarrassed, but...
What is this about, anyway?
When did I do something worthy of this kind of reward?
You do not have to put on that weird tough act now.
Did not you tell me to lend you my lap when you were exhausted?
I cannot do this all the time, but today is special.
Special?
It is only my second day.
If I am already completely worn out, what kind of weakling am I?
It is plain to see that you are overwhelmed.
You will not tell me what is really going on, will you?
I cannot imagine this will make things any easier,
but this is all I can do.
Emilia-tan, come on, now...
Are you tired?
I am totally fine.
Are you troubled?
If you are this nice to me, I am going to fall in love with you.
When you...
I mean, like that...
It is been rough, has not it?
It was rough...
It was so painful.
I was so scared.
I was so sad...
It hurt so much, I thought I would die...
Uh-huh.
I tried so hard.
I tried so hard!
I was so desperate...
So desperate to make everything right!
It is the truth.
I have honestly never tried so hard at anything in my life!
Uh-huh, I know.
Because I loved this place...
Because it was so important to me!
I was so desperate to get it back...
I was scared... I was so scared!
I did not want those eyes looking at me like that again...
And I hated myself so much for feeling that way!
Subaru-kun?
Shh.
Is Subaru-kun just asleep?
Yes.
He looks like a child, does not he?
It appears Subaru-kun cannot do any more work today.
Yes, he is done for today.
What a bad boy, taking a day off, on just his second day of work.
When he feels better, you can punish him.
Seeing him like this, I almost do not want to.
Yeah.
I shall inform my sister that Subaru-kun will be useless for today.
Rem...
Subaru is a good person.
Did I really just bawl all over the girl I love
and fall asleep, with tears and snot all over my face?
What kind of shame play is that?!
I am totally hopeless!
You burst in here late at night, and that is what you say, I suppose?
Do not say that, Beako...
We are tight, are not we?
What kind of relationship do you think we
Wait, what did you just call me?
Oh...
Beako?
I think pet names are indispensable in showing affection.
So I am going to call you Beako.
That is the best proof of my affection that I can give.
What sort of obtrusive display of goodwill is that?
That is not just disgusting.
It is revolting, hmph!
Do not be so cold, Beako!
The thing is...
I am backed into a corner here.
Honestly, I want your help with the curses I asked about.
I told you that, once activated, curses cannot be undone, I suppose.
Yeah, you did.
But can you detect curses before they are activated instead?
I am capable of discovering curses before they are activated.
How are curses placed?
There is one rule of casting curses that cannot be broken, I suppose.
A rule that cannot be broken?
Physical contact with the curse's target.
That is the prerequisite.
Other than those in this mansion,
I have only touched the villagers at the base of the mountain.
I was cursed in the village,
it activated that night, in the mansion,
and then I died?
That would explain why the shaman got Rem last time.
I did not go to the village, so she ended up being the target.
It fits...
It all fits now!
I have finally found a lead,
damn it!
Is that any attitude to take toward someone you asked for help, I suppose?
If it was helpful to you, I think there is something you should say.
Yeah, that is right!
You saved me!
Thanks to you, I can see the light!
Beako, I love you!
Let me
Put me down, I suppose!
Dorowazu!
And so, a lot's happened,
but today is a fresh start!
I am a new me!
The lap pillow, right?
It was the lap pillow.
Huh?
Wait, you guys knew?
Subaru, good morning.
Emilia-tan?
Um, this is kind of embarrassing...
Are you feeling okay?
I was not so sure till I heard your voice just now, but...
I am okay now.
So, um, listen...
I am sorr
I mean, thanks for everything.
Well, shall we start on this morning's work, Subaru-kun?
We need to begin our morning duties.
Before that, I have a favor to ask.
A lap pillow, right?
It is a lap pillow.
I am not that unscrupulous!
Actually, I want to go to the village.
It is not far, right?
Do we have any plans to shop for anything?
If I recall, we are low on seasonings,
so I was thinking of going to the village tomorrow.
Then why do not we go today instead?
If we are running low, it never hurts to restock sooner!
I do not see a problem with that.
Sister...
You do need to go shopping, and we have no urgent duties.
And you have Barusu to carry your packages.
If you say so, Sister.
All right!
But I am going with you.
You will have a pretty flower on each arm, Barusu.
Huh?
Uh, I just hope those flowers are not poisonous...
I Cried, Cried My Lungs Out, and Stopped Crying
